Package core

Class Board

java.lang.Object
core.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
MachineRandom
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements MachineRandom
Class implementing the board, which consists of the colored spaces where the actual gameplay happens

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int INDEX_FORK_CAREER
    Index of the Which Path space forking to the Normal vs Change Career Path
    static int INDEX_FORK_FAMILY
    Index of the Which Path space forking to the Normal vs Start A Family Path
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_CAREER_1
    Index of the space corresponding to the Normal Path at a Which Path juncture
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_CAREER_2
    Index of the space corresponding to the Change Career Path at a Which Path juncture
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_FAMILY_1
    Index of the space corresponding to the Normal Path at a Which Path juncture
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_FAMILY_2
    Index of the space corresponding to the Start a Family Path at a Which Path juncture
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_START_1
    Index of the space corresponding to the Career Path at the start of the game
    static int NEXT_INDEX_FORK_START_2
    Index of the space corresponding to the College Path at the start of the game
    static int NUM_SPACES
    Number of colored spaces in the board

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Creates a board object consisting of colored spaces: orange, blue, green, and magenta spaces (as well as start and end spaces) that dictate the layout and course of the gameplay

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ColoredSpace getColoredSpace​(int index)
    Returns the colored space given the specified index
    int getIndexMagentaInRange​(int startIndex, int endIndex)
    Returns the index of the magenta space in the range of indices specified; if no magenta space exists in the said range, -1 is returned
    int getMachineRandNum()
    Returns a randomly generated value between 1 and 2, inclusive, to determine whether a Have Baby or Have Twins space is to be generated
    boolean isBlueSpace​(int index)
    Returns true if the space corresponding to the specified index is blue; false, otherwise
    boolean isGreenSpace​(int index)
    Returns true if the space corresponding to the specified index is green; false, otherwise
    boolean isMagentaSpace​(int index)
    Returns true if the space corresponding to the specified index is magenta; false, otherwise
    boolean isOrangeSpace​(int index)
    Returns true if the space corresponding to the specified index is orange; false, otherwise
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of this board, which includes the string representations of all its colored spaces

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • getColoredSpace

      public ColoredSpace getColoredSpace​(int index)
      Returns the colored space given the specified index
      Parameters:
      index - index of the colored space to be returned
      Returns:
      colored space corresponding to the index

    • getIndexMagentaInRange

      public int getIndexMagentaInRange​(int startIndex, int endIndex)
      Returns the index of the magenta space in the range of indices specified; if no magenta space exists in the said range, -1 is returned
      Parameters:
      startIndex - start index of the range of indices considered
      endIndex - end index of the range of indices considered
      Returns:
      index of the magenta space in the range of indices specified; -1 if there is no such magenta space

    • isOrangeSpace

      public boolean isOrangeSpace​(int index)
      Returns true if the space corresponding to the specified index is orange; false, otherwise
      Parameters:
      index - index of the space to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the space corresponding to the specified index is orange; false, otherwise

      Returns:

    • getMachineRandNum

      public int getMachineRandNum()
      Returns a randomly generated value between 1 and 2, inclusive, to determine whether a Have Baby or Have Twins space is to be generated

      Technically, the number is generated in a pseudorandom fashion, which is adequate for the purposes of the game.

      Specified by:
      getMachineRandNum in interface MachineRandom
      Returns:
      Randomly generated value within the lower and upper bounds for the maximum number of pay raises (inclusive)

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this board, which includes the string representations of all its colored spaces
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      string representation of this board
